name: STARRY WALTZ [NAIBELI IDV FANGAME]
description:
This is a bonus game for people who purchased my products from Comifuro 14 2020.

I will release the free, non-completed one later for everyone later :d

Please note that I haven't tested the MAC build, if something happens feel free to tell me!

Details:

-This is an IDV fangame that unrelated to canon lores (alternate universe).

-The pairing will be Naib Subedar (Clarity) x Eli Clark (Lifted).

-Made entirely in RPGMaker MV.

-BL // R-18 // Visual Novel with little gameplay.

-Contains 9 endings, 3 of them are joke endings.

-Around one hour gameplay depending on the player's reading speed.

-This is by Naibeli fan for all Naibeli fans, so beware for how self-indulgent this game is.
